children.teaser: How Authors Support Their Opinions with Reasons and Evidence

children.title: Reading as Writers: Identifying Characteristics of Broadsides

children.teaser: The mid-unit assessment gauges’ students’ ability to read and analyze opinion writing.

children.title: Planning to Write Broadsides

children.title: Revising for Organization: Grouping Reasons with Related Evidence
children.teaser: The students examine the Quaker broadside: final draft for how authors write effectively.

children.teaser: Students participate in a mock vote as a way to “experience” an unfair voting situation.

children.title: Summarizing Informational Text: “The Vote”
